detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好。4 月 1 日從英國返港，4 月 2 日測試結果呈陰性，抵港後在酒店進行強制檢疫。檢疫期完畢由酒店乘的士回家，4 月 13 日開始發燒及喉嚨痛，4 月 15 日到明愛醫院求診，檢測結果為陽性。

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者居於荷蘭，4 月 14 日抵港，強制家居檢疫人士。患者無病徵。
detail_en: The patient resides in the Netherlands and returned to Hong Kong on April 14. He was under compulsory home quarantine and exhibits no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者與妻子居於英國，4 月 14 日返港，3 月 17 日開始發燒及咳嗽。患者妻子亦有病徵但已康復，患者回港前已無病徵。
detail_en: The patient resides in the UK with his wife and returned to Hong Kong on April 14. He began fever and coughing on March 17 but exhibited no symptoms upon return to Hong Kong. His wife developed and recovered from related symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者 2 月尾至 4 月 10 日到過摩洛哥，乘摩洛哥包機回港，4 月 10 日在廣州白雲機場接受核酸測試結果為陰性。抵港後在酒店進行強制家居檢疫，4 月 11 日因大便有血乘坐的士到瑪嘉烈醫院求醫。患者有家人於 3 月 9 日已從摩洛哥回港，家人已確診。（衞生防護中心於 4 月 16 日更正患者在 4 月 11 日是乘搭酒店安排大巴到葵芳港鐵站再轉乘小巴到醫院。）
detail_en: The patient was in Morroco between late February and April 10 and returned on a chartered flight, having tested negative at the Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport through nucleic acid testing and under compulsory home quarantine at a hotel upon return to Hong Kong. On April 11 she sought treatment at Princess Margaret Hospital for rectal bleeding. Other family members of the patient returning on March 9 from Morroco to Hong Kong are confirmed cases.

detail_zh: 患者留學英國，4 月 14 日返港，由亞洲博覽館送院。 患者無病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on April 14. He was hospitalised from AsiaWorld-Expo and exhibits no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，沒有病徵。3 月 24 日抵港，由於當時未加強檢疫及病毒檢測安排故沒有留深喉唾液樣本進行檢驗。完成強制家居檢疫後仍有擔心，其父親帶同其兄弟到私家醫院進行檢驗，患者檢驗結果呈陽性。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has no symptoms. He arrived in Hong Kong on March 24. As quarantine and testing regulations were no strengthened at that time, he did not leave a deep throat salive sample for testing. After completing compulsory home quarantine, he was still worried. His father took him and his brother to a private hospital for an examination, and his test result came out positive.

detail_zh: 患者是美國留學生，4月13日從美國返港，並沒有任何病徵。由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US and returned to Hong Kong on April 13. He has no symptoms. He was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo.

detail_zh: 患者3月11日至4月13日到過美國，並沒有任何病徵，由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient was in the US between March 11 and April 13 and has no symptoms. He was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo.

detail_zh: 患者居於英國，4 月 12 日返港，由亞洲博覽館送院，3 月 25 日在英國已出現發燒、咳嗽及呼吸困難病徵。
detail_en: The patient lives in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on April 12. He was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo. When he was still in the UK on March 25, he started having fevre, cough, and difficulty breathing.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為 14 個月大孩童，與家人於 2 月 1 日至 4 月 7 日曾到英國，沒有病徵，其家庭傭工為 第 #993 宗患者。4 月 9 日交回大便樣本，檢驗結果為初步陽性，由檢疫中心轉送到醫院跟進。
detail_en: The patient is a 14-month-old infant and was in the UK with her family between February 1 and April 7. Their domestic helper is patient #993. Her stool sample received dated April 9 was tested positive preliminarily, and she was transferred from the Quarantine Centre to hospital for follow-up.

detail_zh: 患者為第 #884 宗患者的父親，沒有病徵，由檢疫中心送院 。
detail_en: The patient is the father of patient #884 and exhibits no symptoms. He was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者是第 #988 宗患者的丈夫，二人於 2 月 5 日至 4 月 8 日到過印尼，強制家居檢疫人士。 3 月 29 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient is the husband of patient #988, both of whom were in Indonesia between February 5 and April 8 and under compulsory home quarantine. He began coughing on March 29.

detail_zh: 患者曾往美國及英國旅遊，到阿根廷及巴拉圭並乘坐遊輪珊瑚公主號 (Coral Princess) ，4月12日返港，在亞洲博覽館留深喉唾液樣本檢驗後證實確診，沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient travelled on the cruise Coral Princess to Argentina and Paraguay, and her deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive at the AsiaWorld-Expo upon return to Hong Kong. She exhibits no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者家人為 #956，一起前往加拿大，為加拿大留學生，3 月 28 日返港後於檢疫中心接受檢疫，4 月 8 日開始喉嚨痛及發燒。
detail_en: Studying in Canada, the patient is a family member of patient #956 who travelled together to Canada. She was transferred to the Quarantine Centre upon return to Hong Kong on March 28, and developed sore throat and fever on April 8.

detail_zh: 患者留學英國，3 月 29 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士，4 月 8 日有頭痛及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient studies in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on March 29. He was under compulsory home quarantine, and developed headache and running nose on April 8.

detail_zh: 患者是 #902 的密切接觸者，4 月 1 日發燒、流鼻水及腹瀉。
detail_en: A close contact of patient #902, the patient developed fever, running nose and diarrhea on April 1.
classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者於美國旅遊後，4 月 9 日返港，無病徵，強制家居檢疫人士，於 4 月 12 日確診。
detail_en: The patient returned from travel to the US on April 9 and was under compulsory home quarantine. He exhibits no symptoms and tested positive for the virus on April 12.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，3 月 31 日開始頭痛。3 月至 4 月 9 日曾到日本，回港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and started having headaches on March 31. He was in Japan between March and April 9. After returning to Hong Kong, he went under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，2 月 14 日至 4 月 9 日曾到日本，回港後接受強制家居檢疫，沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Japan between Feb 14 and April 9. After returning to Hong Kong, she went under compulsory home quarantine and has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，3 月 5 日至 4 月 10 日曾到秘魯，返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。她於 3 月 25 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Peru between March 5 and April 10. After returning to Hong Kong, she was sent to the hospital from the Asia World Expo. On March 25, she started coughing.

detail_zh: 患者為 #976 的女朋友，同屬「酒吧及樂隊」群組，曾兩次到 All Night Long 酒吧，男友先確診，但懷疑是被患者所感染。患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 3 月 25 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient is the girlfriend of patient #976 and is part of the Bars and Bands cluster. She recently went to the bar All Night Long twice. Her boyfriend was diagnosed as positive first, but is suspected to have been infected by the patient first. The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. She started coughing on March 25.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，與 #843 （同為美國留學生）有關連，3 月 29 日返後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 31 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US. Her case is related to the case of patient #843, who is also a study abroad student in the US. After returning to Hong Kong on March 29, she went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 31, she started having fever and cough.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 3 月 13 日至 24 日曾到英國。他於 4 月 7 日開始流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK betwen March 13 to 24. He started having runny nose on April 7.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，4 月  10 日返港後由亞洲博覽送院。他一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. He returned to Hong Kong on April 10 and was sent to the hospital from Asia World Expo. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，曾到英國旅遊兩個月，4 月 10 日返港後，從亞洲博覽館送院。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and traveled in the UK for two months. After returning to Hong Kong on April 10, she was sent to the hospital from the Asia World Expo. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 2 月 1 日至 4 月 7 日曾與僱主一家到英國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 28 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and and went to the UK between Feb 1 and April 7 with her employer's family. After returning to Hong Kong, she went under compulsory home quarantine. She started having a fever on March 28.

detail_zh: 患者與 #777 有關連，過往健康良好，在美國居住，3 月 30 日返港，安排於檢疫中心送院。他於 4 月 1 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient's case is related to the case of patient #777. He has good past health and lives in the US. On March 30, he returned to Hong Kong and was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre. On April 1, he started coughing.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與 #629  同於 3 月 13 至 24 日到過英國，由檢疫中心送院。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK betwen March 13 to 24 with patient #629. She was transferred to hospital from the Quarantine Centre. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 4 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 4 月 9 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient was studying abroad in the US and has good past health. On April 4, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On April 9, she started having a fever.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 22 日至 3 月 25 日到過加拿大及美國，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Canada and the US between Feb 22 and March 25. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，2 月 5 日至 4 月 8 日到過印尼，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 4 月 2 日開始頭暈。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and was in Indonesia between Feb 5 and April 8. After returning to Hong Kong, she went under compulsory home quarantine. On April 2, she started having dizziness.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 8 日返港接受強制家居檢疫。他同日出現咳嗽及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient was studying abroad in the UK and has good past health. On April 8, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On the same day, he started having cough and runny nose.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 9 日返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient was studying abroad in the UK and has good past health. On April 9, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 8 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 3 月 26 日開始咳嗽及喉嚨痛。
detail_en: The patient was studying abroad in the UK and has good past health. On April 8, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 26, he started having cough and sore throat.

detail_zh: 患者 2 月 28 日至 4 月 8 日到過加拿大，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 3 月 19 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient was in Canada between Feb 28 and April 8. After returning to Hong Kong, he went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 19 he started coughing.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 4 日至 4 月 8 日到過加拿大，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 3 月 30 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Canada between March 4 and April 8. He went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. He started coughing on March 30.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 7 日返港接受強制家居檢疫，翌日開始流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On April 7, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. The next day he started having runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 17 日至 4 月 8 日曾到菲律賓，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。患者一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the Philippines between March 17 and April 8. After returning to Hong Kong she went under compulsory home quarantine. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，於英國留學。3 月 30 日出現流鼻水，4 月 9 日返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was studying abroad in the UK. On March 30, she started having runny nose. On April 9, she was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，沒有病徵，於美國留學。3 月 27 日返港後進行強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no symptoms. He was studying abroad in the US. On March 27, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好， 1 月 15 日至 3 月 20 日曾到德國和英國，完成家居檢疫後一直沒有病徵，因擔心而前往私家化驗所測試，結果呈陽性。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Germany and the UK between January 15 and March 20. After completing home quarantine he still had no symptoms. He was still worried, and went to a private laboratory for testing, and tested positive.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，於 3 月13 至 24 日曾到荷蘭及法國，3 月 17 日出現發燒及咳嗽，及後感覺已痊癒。3 月 24 日回港後進行家居檢疫，其間沒有感覺到不適，完成家居檢疫後仍有擔心，留深喉唾液化驗後結果為陽性。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the Netherlands and France between March 13 and 24. On March 17, he started having fever and cough but afterwards felt recovered. On March 24, he returned to Hong Kong for home quarantine and did not feel discomfort during the quarantine period. However, he was still worried after completing the home quarantine, and later after leaving his deep throat saliva sample, turned out to test positive.

detail_zh: 患者與家人同住，過往健康紀錄良好，沒有外遊。3 月 28 日出現咳嗽及失去嗅覺。女朋友曾於 3 月 18 及 20 日到過 All Night Long 酒吧。
detail_en: The patient lives with his family and has good past health. He has no recent travel history. On March 28, he started having cough and losing his sense of smell. His girlfriend had been to the bar All Night Long on March 18 and 20.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學英國，3 月 18 日返港，沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. She returned to Hong Kong on March 18 and has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者是 #757 患者（40 日大嬰兒）的爸爸、#891 患者的丈夫，與 #462 患者有關連。他過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 8 日出現發燒，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient is father of 40-day-old infant (#757) and husband of #891. With good past health and no travel history, he developed fever on April 8, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者曾光顧 Centre Stage 酒吧，屬酒吧及樂隊群組。他於 3月 21 日開始發燒。患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。
detail_en: The patient is a patron of Centre Stage and is part of the Bars and Bands cluster. He developed fever on March 21, and has good past health and no travel history.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 3 日至 20 日到過美國。他於 3 月 27 日開始咳嗽及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the US between March 3 and 20. He started having cough and runny nose on March 27.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 27 日至 3 月 23 日先後到過英國、法國及荷蘭，他一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and visited the UK, France, and the Netherlands, respectively between February 27 and March 23. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 5 日返港後，於荃灣帝盛酒店接受強制檢疫。她同日開始頭痛。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On April 5, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory quarantine in the Dorsett Tsuen Wan Hotel. She started having a headache on the same day.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好。他於 3 月 20 日開始咳嗽，4 月 6 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 20, he started coughing. On April 6, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與家人居於上環，在利園一期上班，平常夜晚會在信德中心對外慢跑。最後上班日期為 4 月 3 日，4 月 4 日出現發燒，4 月 8 日入院。
detail_en: The patient lives in Sheung Wan with his family, works at Lee Garden One, and jogs around Shun Tak Centre regularly at night. He last worked on April 3, developed fever on April 4, and was hospitalised on April 8.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 25 日開始失去嗅覺，4 月 8 日返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 25, he started losing his sense of smell. On April 8, he was transferred to the hospital from Asia World Expo after returning to Hong Kong.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 1 日至 4 月 4 日到過法國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 30 日開始發燒，與 #921 患者有流行病學關連。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in France between Feb 1 and April 4. After returning to Hong Kong, she went under compulsory home quarantine. She started having a fever on March 30. Her case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #921.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，於 1 月 19 日至 4 月 5 日到過英國及瑞士，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 14 日開始發燒、咳嗽、失去嗅覺及味覺。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and was in the UK and Switzerland between January 19 and April 5. She went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. She started having fever, cough, and losing her sense of smell and taste on March 14.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患， 2 月 5 日至 4 月 4 日到過美國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 29 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and was in the US between Feb 5 and April 4. After returning to Hong Kong she went under compulsory home quarantine. She started coughing on March 29.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於英國，3 月 25 日開始發燒，4 月 6 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and lives in the UK. On March 25, she started having a fever. She went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on April 6.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於英國，4 月 6 日返港接受強制家居檢疫。他於 4 月 8 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and lives in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on April 6, he went under compulsory home quarantine. On April 8, he started coughing.

detail_zh: 患者為印度籍，於菲律賓銀行擔任文員及接待員。與丈夫同住。她於 4 月 1 日開始咳嗽、喉嚨痛及頭暈。
detail_en: The patient is an Indian national and works at the Bank of the Philippines as a clerk and receptionist. She lives with her husband. On April 1 she started having cough, sore throat, and dizziness.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。他於 3 月 31 日到 #801 患者及 #849 患者家中舉行會議，當中有 7 至 8 名與會者，及後於 4 月 3 日開始流鼻水及腹瀉。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no travel history. He attended a meeting at the home of #801 and #849 along with another 7 to 8 attendees. He developed running nose and diarrhea on April 3.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 27 日返港接受強制家居檢疫，3 月 30 日開始呼吸困難。
detail_en: The patient studies in the UK with good past health. She was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong on March 27 and developed breathing difficulty on March 30.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為 #932 的父親，#957 患者的丈夫。他過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，4 月 7 日開始發燒及頭痛。
detail_en: The patient is father of #932 and husband of #957, with good past health and no travel history. He developed fever and headache on April 7.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為 #932 患者的母親，#958 患者的妻子。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，3 月 30 日開始失去嗅覺、呼吸困難及背痛。
detail_en: The patient is mother of #932 and wife of #958, with good past health and no travel history. She developed loss of sense of smelling, breathing difficulty and back pain on March 30.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為加拿大留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 28 日返港接受強制家居檢疫。他於 4 月 4 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient studies in Canada and has good past health. He was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong on March 28 and began coughing on April 4.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，於 1 月中至 3 月 23 日到過德國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has underlying illness and was in Germany between mid-January and March 23. He was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong and exhibits no symptoms.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者與 #903 患者為舊同事，馬莎前員工，暫時無業，曾出席 3 月 25 日於 CEO Neway 的聚會，於 4 月 1 日開始疲倦。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。
detail_en: The patient is an ex-colleague of #903 at Marks & Spencer and is presently unemployed. She attended the March 25 CEO Neway karaoke gathering and developed fatigue on April 1. She has good past health and no travel history.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為兩個月大嬰兒，過往健康良好，3 月 13 日至 4 月 1 日跟隨父母及外傭 （#897 患者）到過英國。他一直沒出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient is a 2-month-old infant with good past health. He was in the UK between March 13 and April 1 with his parents and domestic helper (#897) and exhibits no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 2 月 28 日至 3 月 26 日曾到英國，與 #652 患者、#659 患者、#701 患者及 #880 患者有關連，原在檢疫中心接受隔離，由檢疫中心送院。 患者一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health, was in the UK between February 28 and March 26, and has links to #652, #659, #701 and #880. She was hospitalised from quarantine centre and exhibits no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為 #499 患者（Dusk Till Dawn 酒吧員工）的緊密接觸者，有長期病患，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 5 日開始發燒，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient is a close contact of #499 (Dusk Till Dawn staff member), and has underlying illness and no travel history. She developed a fever on April 5 and was hospitalised from quarantine centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於英國，4 月 1 日開始咳嗽，4 月 4 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。醫院管理局於4月12日公佈該患者病情嚴重，其後在4月13日或以後的記者會並未公佈該名患者的情況，或情況嚴重的患者名單。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and resides in the UK. He began coughing on April 1 and was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong on April 4. The Hospital Authority announced on April 12 that the patient is in serious condition. The press conference on April 13, however, did not supply updates on the patient’s condition, nor was the complete list of patients in serious condition disclosed.

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 1 月至 4 月 2 日曾到瑞典及芬蘭，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Sweden and Finland between January and April 2. After returning to Hong Kong she went under compulsory home quarantine. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於馬來西亞，4 月 5 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and lives in Malaysia. He went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on April 5. He has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 20 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 4 月 2 日開始失去嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient studies in the US and has good past health. She was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong on March 20. She started losing her sense of smell on April 2.

detail_zh: 患者為一名貨機機師，過往健康良好，於 3 月 28 日至 4 月 3 日曾到土耳其及哈薩克。他於 3 月 30 日開始喉嚨痛及失去嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient is a cargo plane pilot. He has good past health and was in Turkey and Kazakhstan between March 28 and April 3. On March 30, he started having sore throat and losing his sense of smell.

detail_zh: 患者為診所運作助理，負責清潔工作，於上水石湖墟門診工作，也有一天於打鼓嶺普通科門診工作。患者與診所病人沒有直接接觸，也沒有接觸深喉唾液樣本。在 4 月 3、4、6 及 7 日均有上班。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 3 日出現喉嚨痛。衞生防護中心於 4 月 9 日確認患者夜間有在粉嶺必勝客及上水薄餅博士擔任清潔。
detail_en: The patient is a clinic operations assistant responsible for cleaning, mainly working at the Shek Wu Hui clinic in Sheung Shui and also, for a day, at the Ta Kwu Ling General Out-Patient Clinic. She did not interact with any other patients nor did she come into contact with any of the deep throat saliva samples. She went to work on April 3, 4, 6, and 7. She has good past health and no recent travel history. On April 3, she started having a sore throat. CHP confirmed on April 9 that the patient also provides janitorial services at Pizza Hut, Fanling and PHD Pizza, Sheung Shui.

detail_zh: 患者於銅鑼灣皇室堡馬莎工作，並沒有出席 3 月 25 日的卡拉 OK 聚會。他與 #903 患者及 #925 患者在同一地方工作，上班時亦有戴口罩，與確診者沒有密切接觸但有可能因環境因素受感染，17 名員工一同送到檢疫。患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient worked at the Marks & Spencer branch in Windsor House, Causeway Bay but did not join the karaoke party on March 25. He shares a workplace with patients #903 and #925. He wore a mask during work hours and was not in close contact with other diagnosed patients in the workplace. However, he could have been infected due to environmental factors. He was sent to the Quarantine Centre with 17 other employees. He has good past health and no recent travel history. He has no symptoms.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為 #833 患者的妻子，過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。她於 4 月 4 日開始發燒及腹瀉，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient is the wife of patient #833. She has good past health and no recent travel history. On April 4, she started having fever and diarrhea, and was tranferred to hospital from the Quarantine Centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於英國，3 月 25 日與家人（ #479 患者、#188 患者 及 #189 患者）從英國返港。她於 4 月 4 日開始發燒及咳嗽，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and lives in the UK. On March 25, she returned to Hong Kong from the UK with family members (patients #479, #188, and #189). On April 4, she started having fever and cough, and wa sent to hospital from the Quarantine Centre.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與太太 #834 患者共同前往瑞士及法國巴黎，3 月中與太太返港，檢疫期間並無病徵，4 月 6 日所取的樣本屬陽性，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and went to Switzerland and Paris, France with his wife, patient #834. He returned to Hong Kong with his wife in mid-March. During the quarantine period, he showed no symptoms. On April 6, his test results came back positive and he was transferred to hospital from the Quarantine Centre.
classification_zh: 輸入個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 1 月至 4 月 4 日曾到荷蘭及法國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the Netherlands and France between January and April 4. He went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，居於英國， 3 月 31 日出現咳嗽及流鼻水，4 月 5 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and lives in the UK. On March 31, she started coughing and having runny nose. On April 5, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 5 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on April 5, she went under compulsory home quarantine. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 3 月 1 日至 4 月 5 日曾到日本，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 4 月 1 日出現流鼻水徵狀。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Japan between March 1 and April 5. She went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. On April 1 she started having runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 7 日至 22 日到過冰島及英國，返港後接強制家居檢疫。他於 4 月 4 日開始失去味覺及嗅覺、咳嗽及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has good past health, was in Iceland and the UK between March 7 and 22, and was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong. He developed loss of senses of tasting and smelling, coughing and running nose on April 4.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，2 月 26 日至 3 月 19 日到過美國及英國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 3 月 11 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has underlying illness and was in the UK and USA between February 26 and March 19. He was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong and began coughing on March 11.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，4 月 2 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫， 4 月 6 日開始咳嗽及發燒。
detail_en: The patient studies in the UK and has good past health. She was under compulsory home quarantine upon return to Hong Kong on April 2, and developed coughing and fever on April 6.

detail_zh: 患者為尼泊爾女子，正在懷孕 19 週期，與兒子居於廟街。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 2 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient is a Nepali 19-week pregnant women and lives with her son on Temple Street. She has good past health and no travel history, and began coughing on April 2.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為馬莎員工，在上環及灣仔分店工作。他與 #903 患者、#923 患者及 #925 患者參與 3 月 25 日 於 CEO Neway 的聚會，其後於 3 月 29 日開始流鼻水。患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。
detail_en: The patient is a staff member of Marks & Spencer, having worked at the Sheung Wan and Wan Chai branches. He went to the CEO Neway gathering with #923 and #925 on March 25, and developed running nouse on March 29. The patient has good past health and no travel history.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為 #461 患者的妻子，夫妻二人曾於 3 月 13 至 23 日同赴澳洲。她一直沒出現病徵，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: Wife of #461, the patient has good healthy history and they both travelled to Australia between March 13 and 23. She exhibits no symptoms and was hospitalised from quarantine centre.

detail_zh: 患者為 #453 患者的兒子，屬酒吧及樂隊群組。他過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，一直沒有出現病徵，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient is the son of #453 and belongs to the 'Bar' cluster. He has good past health, no travel history, exhibits no symptoms, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為酒吧群組，與父母同住在灣仔益誠樓一單位，將其單位分租給 #477 患者及 #525 患者，曾共用廁所，並於 4 月 6 日開始咳嗽，獲安排由檢疫中心送院。他過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。
detail_en: The patient belongs to the 'Bar' cluster, lives with his parents in the apartment in Yick Shing Mansion (Wan Chai) which is sublet to patients #477 and #525 who share a bathroom. He began coughing on April 6 and was hospitalised from quarantine centre. He has good past health and no travel history.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為 #526 患者的丈夫，屬酒吧群組。他有長期病患，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 3 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient is the husband of #526 and belongs to the 'Bar and Band' cluster. He has underlying illness and no travel history, and began a fever on April 3.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，4 月 5 日開始喉嚨痛，4 月 6 日返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studied in the UK, developed sore throat on April 5, and hospitalised from AsiaWorld-Expo on April 6 upon return to Hong Kong.

detail_zh: 患者為 #864 患者的太太，屬酒吧及樂隊群組。她有長期病患，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 1 日開始失去嗅覺、鼻塞及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient is the wife of #864 and belong to the 'Bar and Band' cluster. She has underlying illness and no travel history, and developed loss of sense of smelling, nasal congestion, and coughing on April 1.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為馬莎員工，任職於銅鑼灣分店。與 #903 患者、 #923 患者及 #932 患者參與 3 月 25 日於 CEO Neway 的聚會。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 4 日開始發燒、鼻塞及喉嚨痛。
detail_en: The patient is an employee at the Causeway Bay branch of Marks & Spencer. On March 25, she went to CEO Neway for karaoke with patients #903, #923, and #932. She has good past health and no recent travel history. She started having fever, nasal congestion, and sore throat on April 4.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者是 #759 的母親，過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。她於 4 月 3 日開始頭痛及發冷。
detail_en: The patient is the mother of patient #759. She has good past health and no recent travel history. She started having headaches and chills on April 3.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為馬莎員工，任職於尖沙咀辦公室，曾與 #903 患者、#925 患者及 #932 患者參與 3 月 25 日 於 CEO Neway 的聚會。她過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，於 4 月 3 日開始頭痛。
detail_en: The patient is an employee at the Marks & Spencer office in Tsim Tsa Tsui. On March 25, she went to CEO Neway for karaoke with patients #903, #925, and #932. She has good past health and no recent travel history. She started having headaches on April 3.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，在英國時與 #917 患者同住，於 4 月 4 日返港接受強制家居檢疫。他一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. During his time in the UK, he was living with patient #917. After returning to Hong Kong on April 4, he went under compulsory home quarantine. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為一名女傭，過往健康良好，曾與僱主於 2 月 1 日至 4 月 4 日到過法國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 31 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient works as a domestic helper and has good past health. She visited France with her employer between Feb 1 and April 4. She went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. On March 31, she started having fever and cough.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於美國，3 月 23 日開始咳嗽，4 月 4 日返港，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and lives in the US. On March 23, he started having cough. After returning to Hong Kong on April 4, he has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 22 日至 4 月 4 日到過美國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。患者一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the US between March 22 and April 4. He went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 13 日至 4 月 4 日到過日本，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 4 月 4 日開始發冷、肌肉痛及疲倦。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Japan between Feb 13 and April 4. He went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. He started experiencing chills, muscle aches, and fatigue on April 4.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，在英國時與 #922 患者同住 ，於 4 月 4 日返港，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. During her time in the UK, she was living with patient #922. She returned to Hong Kong on April 4. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於英國，3 月 14 日開始有喉嚨痛，4 月 4 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and lives in the UK. On March 14, he started having a sore throat. After returning to Hong Kong on April 4, he has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 4 月 3 日發病，有流鼻水病徵，於 2 月 26 日至 3 月 26 日到過阿根廷及智利，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient develops running nose on April 3. She was in Argentina and Chile between February 26 and March 26, and was under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 30 日發病，有失去嗅覺病徵，於 3 月 2 日至 3 月 24 日到過尼日利亞，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient lost her sense of smelling on March 30. She was in Nigera between March 2 and 24, and was under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者是 #912 患者的哥哥，居於何文田愛民邨昭民樓，於 3 月 27 日發病，有發燒病徵，母親是 #447患者，於 All Night Long 工作。
detail_en: Elder brother of #912, the patient lives in Chiu Man House, Oi Man Estate, Homantin. He develops fever on March 27. Their mother, #447, works at All Night Long.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者是 #913 患者的弟弟，於 3 月 27 日發病，有發燒病徵；母親為 #447 ，於 All Night Long 工作。
detail_en: Younger brother of #913, the patient develops fever on March 27. Their mother, #447, works at All Night Long.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者與 #910 患者為情侶，於 3 月 27 日發病，有發燒、咳嗽病徵，3 月 6 日至 4 月 5 日到秘魯旅行，由亞洲博覽館送院，秘魯回港人士。
detail_en: The patient and #910 are couple. She developed fever and coughing on March 27, and was travelling in Peru between March 6 and April 5. One of the returnees from Peru, she was transferred from AsiaWorld-Expo to hospital.

detail_zh: 患者與 #911 患者為情侶，於 3 月 27 日發病，有發燒、咳嗽病徵；3 月 6 至 4 月 5 日曾到秘魯自由行，由亞洲博覽館送院，秘魯回港人士。
detail_en: The patient and #911 are couple. He developed fever and coughing on March 27, and was travelling in Peru between March 6 and April 5. One of the returnees from Peru, he was transferred from AsiaWorld-Expo to hospital.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，與 #907 患者及 #908 患者於 2 月 27 日至 4 月 5 日曾到過巴西、阿根廷、智利、復活島及秘魯，由亞洲博覽館送院，秘魯回港人士。
detail_en: Exhibiting no symptoms, the patient was in Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Easter Island and Peru along with #907 and #908. One of the returnees from Peru, he was transferred from AsiaWorld-Expo to hospital.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，與 #907 患者及 #909 患者於 2 月 27 日至 4 月 5 日曾到過巴西、阿根廷、智利、復活島及秘魯，由亞洲博覽館送院，秘魯回港人士。
detail_en: Exhibiting no symptoms, the patient was in Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Easter Island and Peru along with #907 and #909. One of the returnees from Peru, he was transferred from AsiaWorld-Expo to hospital.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，與 #908 患者及 #909 患者於 2 月 27 日至 4 月 5 日曾到過巴西、阿根廷、智利、復活島及秘魯，由亞洲博覽館送院，秘魯回港人士。
detail_en: Exhibiting no symptoms, the patient was in Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Easter Island and Peru along with #908 and #909. One of the returnees from Peru, she was transferred from AsiaWorld-Expo to hospital.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者無病徵，為酒吧 All Night Long 職員，檢疫中心覆檢時呈陽性，由檢疫中心送院。酒吧及樂隊群組。
detail_en: Belonging to the 'Bar and Band' cluster, the patient exhibits no symptoms, is a bar staff member of All Night Long, and tested positive the second time.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為 #411 患者的女友，二人同住，男友到過酒吧，無病徵，沒有外遊紀錄。她於 3 月 26 日進入檢疫中心，覆檢時呈現陽性。
detail_en: The patient is the girlfriend of #411 and they live together. #411 visited the bars Insomnia and All Night Long. She exhibits no symptoms and has no travel history, was transferred to quarantine centre on March 26, and tested positive the second time.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者報稱住址一欄為不適用，無病徵，沒有外遊紀錄，於檢疫中心第 12 日時覆檢深喉樣本呈陽性。 酒吧及樂隊群組。
detail_en: The patient reported that the address information was not applicable to him. He has no symptoms and no recent travel history. His deep throat sample tested positive in an re-examination during his 12th day at the Quarantine Centre. He is part of the Bars and Bands cluster.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者是 #835 患者的丈夫，3 月 23 日出現流鼻水。任職於銅鑼灣皇室堡馬莎，負責收銀及上貨。於 3 月 25 日出席在 CEO Neway 8 人卡拉 OK 聚會，期間沒戴口罩。最後上班日期為 3 月 28 日。(衞生署於 4 月 7 日記者會更正聚會人數為 8 人 )
detail_en: The patient is the husband of #835. On March 23, he started having runny nose. He is employed at the Windsor House (Causeway Bay) branch of Marks & Spencer and was in charge of the cash register and deliveries. On March 25, he attended a karaoke party at CEO Neway and did not wear a mask. His last day at work was March 28. (On Apr 7, CHP clarified that the number of attendees of the karaoke gathering was 8)

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 28 日發病，有發燒、咳嗽、頭痛病徵，本身居於英國，於 3 月 24 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient fell ill on March 28 and has fever, cough, and headaches. He live sin the UK. On March 24, he returned to Hong Kong and has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 21 日發病，有發燒、喉嚨痛病徵，本身在英國留學，於 3 月 19 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient fell ill on March 21 and has fever and sore throat. She was studying abroad in the UK. On March 19, she returned to Hong Kong and has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，目前等候安排入住醫院，於 2 月 29 日至 4 月 2 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient has no symptoms and is currently awaiting admission to hospital. She was in the UK between Feb 29 and April 2. She is under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，目前等候安排入住醫院，於 1 月至 4 月 2 日到過日本，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient has no symptoms and is currently awaiting admission to hospital. She was in Japan from January until April 2. She is under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 4 月 3 日有失去嗅覺病徵，本身在英國留學， 4 月 3 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient had the symptom of loss of smell on April 3. He was studying abroad in the UK. On April 3, he returned to Hong Kong and has been under compulsory home quarantine.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為家庭外傭，曾與僱主一家到過英國，有喉嚨痛、咳嗽病徵，目前等候安排入住醫院，於 3 月 13 日至 4 月 1 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient is a domestic helper and had visited the UK with her employer's family. She has sore throat and cough. She is currently awaiting admission to hospital. She was in the UK between March 13 and April 1. She has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，於 2 月 23 日至 4 月 4 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient has no symptoms and was in the UK between Feb 23 and April 4. She has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 31 日發病，有發燒病徵，於 3 月 9 日至 3 月 31 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient fell ill on March 31 and had a fever. Between March 9 and 31 he was in the UK. He has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者無病徵，於 1 月 23 日至 4 月 3 日到過英國及美國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient has no symptoms and was in the UK and the US between Jan 23 and April 3. He has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 24 日發病，有失去味覺病徵，本身在英國留學，4 月 4 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient fell ill on March 24 and has the symptom of loss of taste. He studies abroad in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on April 4. He has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者於 4 月 4 日發病，有失去味覺病徵，於 1 月 28 日至 4 月 4 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。
detail_en: The patient fell ill on April 4, including loss of taste. Between Jan 28 and April 4, he was in the UK. He has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者為 #757 患者的母親、#462 患者的朋友，轉送往檢疫中心期間發病。 她於 4 月 3 日開始發燒及流鼻水。
detail_en: Mother of #757 and friend of #462, the patient developed symptoms during the transfer to quarantine centre, and developed fever and running nose on April 3.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者留學英國，3 月 21 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。她沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient studied in the UK, returned to Hong Kong on March 21, and was under compulsory home quarantine. She exhibited no symptoms.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者留學英國，3 月 22 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。他於 3 月 31 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient studied in the UK, returned to Hong Kong on March 22, and was under compulsory home quarantine. He developed fever and coughing on March 31.

detail_zh: 患者居於英國，3 月 25 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。他於 3 月 16 日開始發燒、咳嗽、失去味覺及嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient resided in the UK, returned to Hong Kong on March 25, and was under compulsory home quarantine. He developed fever and coughing, and lost his sense of tasting and smelling on March 16.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 2 日至 25 日到過阿拉伯聯合酋長國，強制家居檢疫人士。他於 4 月 2 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient was in the UAE between March 2 and 25, was under compulsory home quarantine, and developed a fever on April 2.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者留學美國，3 月 26 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。她於 3 月 31 日開始發燒、喉嚨痛。
detail_en: The patient studied in the USA and returned to Hong Kong on March 26. She was under compulsory home quarantine and developed a fever and sore throat on March 31.

detail_zh: 患者留學英國，3 月 21 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士，與 #500 患者有流行病學關連。患者沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient studied in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on March 21. He was under compulsory home quarantine, has epidemiological linkage with #500, and exhibited no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為 #635 患者的密切接觸者，在待轉送檢疫中心時發病。患者於 3 月 22 日至 27 日到過澳門，3 月 30 日開始發燒。
detail_en: A close contact of #635, the patient developed symptoms while awaiting transfer to quarantine centre. He was in Macau between March 22 and 27, and developed a fever on March 30.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者於 2 月 27 日至 3 月 15 日到過法國，3 月 17 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient was in France between February 27 and March 15, and began coughing on March 17.

detail_zh: 患者留學英國，3月18日返港，3月31日開始失去味覺及嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient studied in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on March 18. She lost her sense of tasting and smelling since March 31.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為 #247 患者朋友，轉送往檢疫中心期間發病。患者於 2 月 28 日至 3 月 8 日到過瑞士， 3 月 10 日開始流鼻水。
detail_en: A friend of #247, the patient developed symptoms during the transfer to quarantine centre. He was in Switzerland between February 28 and March 8, and began having running nose on March 10.

detail_zh: 患者於 2 月 25 日至 3 月 26 日到過英國，與 #652 患者、#659 患者及 #701 患者有流行病學關連，由檢疫中心送院。患者一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient was in the UK between February 25 and March 26, and has epidemiological linkage with #652, #659 and #701. He was transferred from quarantine centre and experienced no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 8 日至 28 日到過芬蘭及冰島，由檢疫中心送院，與 #698 患者有流行病學關連。她於 4 月 3 日開始發燒及咳嗽。醫院管理局於4月12日公佈該患者病情嚴重，其後在4月13日或以後的記者會並未公佈該名患者的情況，或情況嚴重的患者名單。
detail_en: The patient was in Finland and Iceland between March 8 and 28, was hospitalised from quarantine centre, and has epidemiological linkage with #698. She began fever and coughing since April 3. The Hospital Authority announced on April 12 that the patient is in serious condition. Later, the press conference on April 13 did not announce updates on the patient's condition nor the list of patients in serious condition.

detail_zh: 患者於 3 月 12 日至 24 日到過英國，強制家居檢疫人士。他於 3 月 28 日開始呼吸困難。
detail_en: The patient was in the UK between March 12 and 24 and was later under compulsory home quarantine. He later experiences breathing difficulty.

detail_zh: 患者為 #360 患者家人，在待轉送檢疫中心時發病。患者沒有病徵。屬酒吧及樂隊群組。
detail_en: The patient is a family member of patient #360. In the process of being transferred to the Quarantine Centre, he became ill. He has no symptoms and is part of the Bars and Bands cluster.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學英國。3 月 19 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 21 日出現咳嗽、發燒及腹瀉。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the UK. On March 19, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 21, she started having cough, fever, and diarrhea.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學英國。4 月 2 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 12 日出現頭痛及發冷。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the UK. On April 2, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 12, he started having headaches and chills.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學英國。3 月 28 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 20 日出現鼻塞、嗅覺及味覺減退及喉嚨痛。與#852患者有流行病學關連。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the UK. On March 28, he returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 20, he started having nasal congestion, decreased sense of smell and taste, and a sore throat. His case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #852.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，4 月 2 日返港。過往健康紀錄良好，沒有病徵，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on April 2. He has a good health record and no symptoms. After returning he went under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，3 月 19 至 4 月 1日曾到加拿大。3 月 31 日出現喉嚨痛、頭痛及味覺減退，由檢疫中心送院，與個案 #836 患者有流行病學關連。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and was in Canada between March 19 and April 1. On March 31, he started having sore throat, headaches, and decreased sense of taste. He was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre. His case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #836.

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學美國。4 月 2 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。4 月 3 日出現喉嚨痛及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the US. On April 2, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On April 3, she started having sore throat and runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，居於英國。4 月 2 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫，沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and lives in the UK. On April 2, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，於美國留學。3 月 7 至 31 日曾到墨西哥、美國及英國，3 月 31 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 15 日出現流鼻水及失去味覺。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the US. Between March 7 and 31, she was in Mexico, the US, and the UK. On March 31, she returned to Hong Kong and went under compulsory home quarantine. On March 15, she started having runny nose and losing her sense of taste.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，1 月 31 日至 4 月 2 日曾到英國，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。4 月 1日出現咳嗽及喉嚨乾渴。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and was in the UK between Jan 31 and April 2. She went under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. On April 1, she started having cough and dryness and thirst in the throat.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，居於英國。4 月 2 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 25 日出現發燒、咳嗽、流鼻水及失去嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the UK. She returned to Hong Kong on April 2 and was placed under compulsory home quarantine. On March 25, she developed fever, cough, runny nose, and loss of smell.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康紀錄良好，留學美國。3 月 21 日返港，抵港後進行強制家居檢疫。3 月 23 日出現鼻塞、失去嗅覺及味覺。
detail_en: The patient has a good health record and studies abroad in the US. He returned to Hong Kong on March 21 and was placed under compulsory home quarantine. On March 23, he developed stuffy nose, loss of smell and taste.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，3 月 18 日返港。過往健康紀錄良好，沒有病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and returned to Hong Kong on March 18. He has a good health record and no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，為酒吧 Dusk Till Dawn 員工。於 3 月 31 日被送往檢疫中心，沒有病徵，4 月 3 日其檢測樣本呈陽性。屬酒吧及樂隊群組。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and was an employee at the bar Dusk Till Dawn. He was sent to the Quarantine Centre on March 31 with no symptoms. On April 3, his test sample came out positive. He is part of the Bars and Bands cluster.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，沒有外遊記錄，曾到 All Night Long 酒吧消遣。患者沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. She had visited the bar All Night Long as a customer. She has no symptoms.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，3 月 20 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。3 月30 日開始喉嚨痛、發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on March 20, he was under compulsory home quarantine. On March 30, he started having sore throat, fever, and cough.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，4 月 3 日返港，由亞洲博覽館送院。3 月 16 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on April 3, he was under compulsory home quarantine. On March 16, he started having fever and cough.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好， 2 月 24 日至 3 月 24 日曾到芬蘭、瑞典及新加坡，強制家居檢疫人士，與 #599 患者、#794 患者、#858 患者、#859 患者有流行病學關連。患者於 3 月 30 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient has good past health. He was in Finland, Sweden, and Singapore between Feb 24 and March 24. He was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. His case has epidemiological links to the cases of patients #599, #794, #858, and #859. On March 30, he started having a fever.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好， 2 月 24 日至 3 月 24 日曾到芬蘭、瑞典及新加坡，強制家居檢疫人士，與 #599 患者、#794 患者、#858 患者、#860 患者有流行病學關連。患者沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health. She was in Finland, Sweden, and Singapore between Feb 24 and March 24. She was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. Her case has epidemiological links to the cases of patients #599, #794, #858, and #860. She has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好， 2 月 24 日至 3 月 24 日曾到芬蘭、瑞典及新加坡，強制家居檢疫人士，與 #599 患者、#794 患者、#859 患者、#860 患者有流行病學關連。他於 3 月 29 日開始腹瀉。
detail_en: The patient has good past health. He was in Finland, Sweden, and Singapore between Feb 24 and March 24. He was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. His case has epidemiological links to the cases of patients #599, #794, #859, and #860. On March 29, he started having diarrhea.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，沒有外遊記錄，曾在 3 月 14 日到 Dusk Till Dawn 酒吧附近的 Joe Bananas Bar 消遣。3 月 25 日開始咳嗽、喉嚨痛及發燒。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. On March 14, he visited the bar Joe Bananas Bar as a customer, which is next to the bar Dusk Till Dawn. On March 25, he started having cough, sore throat, and fever.

detail_zh: 患者曾於 3 月 10 日 至 4 月 1 日因中風在博愛醫院留醫並入住 5/F 內科及老人科病房，3 月 17 日與 #455患者入住同一間病房，3 月 28 日轉至 8/F 內科及老人科病房， 4 月 1 日出院回家。 4 月 3 日因發燒到屯門醫院求醫。
detail_en: The patient was in Pok Oi Hospital receiving treatment between March 10 and April 1 due to stroke. He was on the 5/F internal medicine and geriatric ward. On March 17, he stayed in the same room as patient #455. On March 28, he was transferred to the 8/F internal medicine and geriatric ward and discharged from hospital on April 1. On April 3, he went to Tuen Mun Hospital for treatment due to fever. The Hospital Authority announced on April 5 that the patient was in serious condition. However, in subsequent press conference, the Hospital Authority did not announce the patient’s condition or the list of patients in serious condition.
classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，曾 3 月 23 日於一間酒店自助餐場合與 #428 患者脫口罩短談過。3 月 25 日開始喉嚨痛及發燒。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. On March 23, he had a brief conversation with patient #428 at a hotel buffet and had also taken off his mask. On March 25, he started having sore throat and fever.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，為一名駐守石硤尾警員，與 #663 患者非同一小隊。4 月 1 日開始發燒及肌肉痛。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. He is a police officer stationed at Shek Kip Mei and is not in the same team as patient #663. On April 1, he started developing fever and muscle pains.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為美國留學生，3 月 30 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。患者沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the US. He was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on March 30. He has no symptoms.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，3 月 28 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。3 月 29 日開始鼻塞及失去嗅覺。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. She was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on March 28. On March 29, she started developing nasal congestion and losing her sense of smell.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，3 月 31 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。 4 月 2 日開始咳嗽及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. She was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on March 31. On April 2, she started developing a cough and runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生，3 月 20 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。  3 月 22 日開始失去嗅覺及味覺。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on March 20, she was under compulsory home quarantine. On March 22, she started to lose her sense of smell and taste.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，是 #719 患者的健身教練、 #801 患者的妻子，同為 F45 教練群組，由檢疫中心送院。患者 3 月 31 日開始咳嗽及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and is the fitness trainer of patient #719 and the wife of patient #801. She is part of the F45 trainers cluster. She was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre. She started having cough and runny nose on March 31.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與 #338 患者有流行病學關連，由檢疫中心送院。患者沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health. Her case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #338. She was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre. She has no symptoms.
classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為英國留學生， 4 月 1 日返港，強制家居檢疫人士。  患者沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and studies abroad in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on April 1, he was under compulsory home quarantine. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，曾到尖沙咀 All Night Long 酒吧消遣，屬酒吧及樂隊群組。 他於 3 月 24 日開始發燒及喉乾。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. He had visited the bar All Night Long in Tsim Tsa Tsui for recreation, and is part of the Bars and Bands cluster. On March 24, he started having a fever and dry throat.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，居於巴基斯坦，於 3 月 21 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，其後於 3 月 31 日出現發燒。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and lives in Pakistan. After returning to Hong Kong on March 21, he has been under compulsory home quarantine. On March 31, he started having a  fever.

detail_zh: 患者是一名飛機清潔員，無外遊紀錄，丈夫為酒吧樂隊表演者。曾在 3 月 19 及 22 日上班，在送檢疫中心期間發燒。 與 #746 患者有流行病學關連。她於 4 月 2 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient is an aircraft cleaner with no recent travel history. Her husband is bar performer. She went to work on March 19 and 22 and developed a fever in the process of being sent to the Quarantine Centre. Her case is epidemiologically related to the case of patient #746. On April 2, she started having a fever.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好， 3 月 30 日返港接受強制家居檢疫。 她於 4 月 2 日開始發燒。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 30, she was under compulsory home quarantine. On April 2, she started developing a fever.

detail_zh: 患者與 #567 患者在同一酒吧工作，無外遊紀錄，於檢疫中心發病送院。他於 4 月 2 日開始發燒、鼻塞及頭痛。
detail_en: The patient worked with patient #567 in the same bar. He has no recent travel history. He was sent to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre. On April 2, he started having a fever, nasal congestion, and headache.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 26 日至 4 月 2 日到過法國，於 3 月 27 日開始咳嗽，返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in France between Feb 26 and April 2. On March 27, he started coughing. After returning to Hong Kong, he was sent to hospital from the Asia World Expo.

detail_zh: 患者為一名公司司機，過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，入院時氣促未能提供詳細資料。他於 3 月 25 日開始咳嗽及流鼻水。親友透露患者曾於潛服期間，有乘客在車上嘔吐，但該名乘客不是確診者。
detail_en: The patient is a company driver with good past health. He has no recent travel history. He had difficulty breathing when he was admitted to hospital and was unable to provide more detailed information. He began to have cough and runny nose on March 25. His relatives and friends have shared that he recently had a passenger vomit in his vehicle during his incubation period, though the passenger was not a diagnosed patient.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 5 日至 3 月 28 日到過英國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫，翌日出現腹瀉及發燒。她與 #669 患者有關連。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK between Feb 5 and March 28. After returning to Hong Kong she has been under compulsory home quarantine. The day after returning, she started having diarrhea and a fever. Her case is linked to the case of patient #669.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，從事表演活動，與 #630 及 #432 患者有關連。他於 3 月 31 日開始發燒及流鼻水，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was engaged in performances. His case is related to the cases of patients #630 and #432. On March 31, he started having a fever and runny nose. He was sent to hospital from the Quarantine Centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 2 月 5 日至 4 月 2 日到過愛爾蘭，由亞洲博覽館送院。他於 3 月 18 日開始發燒及咳嗽，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。( 衞生防護中心於 4 月 4 日更新送院及住址資料 )
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Ireland between Feb 5 and April 2. He was sent to hospital from Asia World Expo. On March 18, he started having fever and cough. After returning to Hong Kong, he was under compulsory home quarantine. (CHP updated details regarding transfer to hospital and address information on April 4.)

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 19 日至 4 月 1 日到過加拿大，返港後接受強制家居檢疫，翌日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Canada between Feb 19 and April 1. After returning to Hong Kong, she has been under compulsory home quarantine. The day after arriving, she started having fever and cough.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為文職人員，過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄。她於 3 月 27 日開始頭痛、咳嗽及喉嚨痛。其丈夫（#903 患者）於 4 月 6 日確診。
detail_en: The patient is a clerk with good past health and no recent travel history. On Mar 27, she started having headaches, cough, and sore throat. Her husband (#903) tested positive on Apr 6.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，2 月 19 日至 3 月 19 日到過法國及瑞士，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。她於 3 月 24 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in France and Switzerland between Feb 19 and March 19. After returning to Hong Kong, she has been under compulsory home quarantine. She started coughing on March 24.

detail_zh: 患者為國泰航空的地勤人員，過往健康良好，無外遊紀錄，3 月 26 日出現發燒、腹瀉、咳嗽及失去味覺，但翌日仍有上班。他曾於 3 月 22 日與親友參加喪禮，3 月 23 日參與一個 13 至 14 人的解穢酒，張竹君表示目前正在追蹤宴會上的親友，相關人士暫未需要進入檢疫中心。
detail_en: The patient is a Cathay Pacific grounds staff with good past health and no recent travel history. On March 26, he started having fever, diarrhea, cough, and began losing his sense of taste, but he went to work the next day. He went to a funeral on March 22 with relatives and friends. On March 23 he also joined a traditional Chinese reception banquet after the funeral with 13-14 people. Dr Chuang Shuk Kwan (Head of Communicable Disease Branch, Centre for Health Protection), said that they are currently tracking down the relatives and friends who attended the banquet, though they may not yet need to be transferred to a Quarantine Centre.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 28 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，4 月 1 日開始發燒及咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 28, she was under compulsory home quarantine. On April 1, she started having fever and cough.

detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 29 日開始發燒、咳嗽及流鼻水，3 月 31 日返港後由亞洲博覽館送院。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US and has good past health. On March 29, he started having fever, cough, and runny nose. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he was transferred to hospital from the Asia World Expo.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 12 日至 17 日到過德國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫。他於 3 月 21 日開始頭痛及疲倦。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in Germany between March 12 and 17. After returning to Hong Kong, he has been under compulsory home quarantine. On March 21, he started having headaches and experiencing fatigue.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，為 #828 患者的哥哥，二人同為英國留學生。他於 3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and is the older brother of patient #828. They are both students in the UK. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he has been under compulsory home quarantine. He has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，為 #829 患者的弟弟，二人同為英國留學生。他於 3 月 29 日出現發燒、咳嗽及流鼻水，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and is the younger brother of patient #829. They are both students in the UK. On March 29, he started having a fever, cough, and runny nose. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者居於菲律賓，為一名家庭外傭，過往健康良好，4 月 1 日由馬尼拉到港後接受強制家居檢疫。她一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient lives in the Philippines and works as a domestic helper. She has good past health. On April 1 she came to Hong Kong from Manila and has been under compulsory home quarantine. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 23 日開始疲倦，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 23, he started experiencing fatigue. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he has been under compulsory home quarantine.

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 19 日出現咳嗽，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 19, she started coughing. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, she has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 30 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 30, she was under compulsory home quarantine. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，於 2 月 29 至 3 月 30 日曾到美國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the US between Feb 28 and March 30. After returning to Hong Kong she has been under compulsory home quarantine. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，同日出現疲倦及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, she has been under compulsory home quarantine. On the same day of her return, she started experiencing fatigue and having a runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 16 日開始發燒及喉嚨痛，3 月 30 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the US and has good past health. On March 16, she started having a fever and sore throat. After returning to Hong Kong on March 30, she has been under compulsory home quarantine.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 26 日開始流鼻水，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 26, she started having a runny nose. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, she has been under compulsory home quarantine.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 18 日開始有喉嚨痛及失去味覺，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. On March 18, she started having a sore throat and losing her sense of taste. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, she has been under compulsory home quarantine.

hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月 12 日至 31 日到過英國，返港後接受家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK between March 12 and 31. She has been under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he was under compulsory home quarantine. He has had no symptoms.

hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he was under compulsory home quarantine. He has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，3 月 31 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，同日出現腹瀉及流鼻水。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. After returning to Hong Kong on March 31, he was under compulsory home quarantine. On the same day of his return, he started having diarrhea and runny nose.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，赴美國旅遊一個月，3 月 30 日返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and traveled in the US for a month. After returning to Hong Kong on March 30, she has been under compulsory home quarantine. She has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，曾於 1 月 14 日至 3 月 31 日到英國，返港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the UK between Jan 14 and March 31. After returning to Hong Kong he was under compulsory home quarantine. He has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，3 月初至 3 月 16 日到過美國，一直沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and was in the US from early March until March 16. He has had no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者為英國留學生，過往健康良好，曾與 #639 及 #678 患者去英國交流，3 月 27 日返港進行強制家居檢疫，3 月 30 日開始咳嗽，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient studies abroad in the UK and has good past health. He went on exchange to the UK with patients #639 and #678. He was under compulsory home quarantine after returning to Hong Kong on March 27. On March 30, he started coughing and was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre.

detail_zh: 患者為 #513（Insomnia 酒吧樂手）的朋友，過往健康良好，4 月 2 日開始喉嚨痕癢、咳嗽及頭痛，由檢疫中心送院。
detail_en: The patient is friends with patient #513 (musician at the bar Insomnia). She has good past health. On April 2, she started developing an itchy throat, cough, and headaches. She was transferred to the hospital from the Quarantine Centre.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，曾於 1 月 28 日至 3 月 18 日到英國，3 月 31 日開始咳嗽。
detail_en: The patient has good past health. Between Jan 28 and March 18, he was in the UK. On March 31, he started coughing.

detail_zh: 患者為屯門醫院護士，過往健康良好，3 月 13 至 22 日曾到倫敦。他的最後上班日期為 3 月 9 日，回港後接受強制家居檢疫，一直沒有上班，亦沒有出現病徵。
detail_en: The patient is a nurse at Tuen Mun Hospital and has good past health. He was in London between March 13 and 22. His last day at work was March 9. After returning to Hong Kong he was under compulsory home quarantine, and did not go to work. He has no symptoms.

detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，與 #319 患者為朋友，與 #266 患者、#319 患者及 #342 患者有關連，曾到中環 La Cabane 飲酒，另於 3 月 4 日至 17 日曾到美國，返港後進行強制家居檢疫，在 3 月 23 日開始發燒，衞生署認為是與從密切接觸者感染的機會較大。
detail_en: The patient has good past health and is friends with patient #319. He is connected to patients #266, #319, and #342. He recently went to La Cabane in Central for drinks. He also visited the US between March 4 and 17. After returning to Hong Kong he was under compulsory home quarantine. On March 23, he started developing a fever. The Department of Health believes that his case is likely due to interaction with his close contacts.
classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

His parents (#954 and #891) subsequently tested positive as well.
